C.description: Allows an identity to create new resources in a container.

R.description: Allows an identity to view the contents of a resource or container.

U.description: Allows an identity to update the contents of a resource or container.

D.description: Allows an identity to delete the contents of a resource or container.

X.description: Allows all permissions to the contents of a resource or container.

c.description: Allows an identity to permit identities to create new resources in a container.

r.description: Allows an identity to permit identities to read the contents or a resource or container.

u.description: Allows an identity to permit identities to update the contents of a resource or container.

d.description: Allows an identity to permit identities to delete the contents of a resource or container.

x.description: Allows an identity to permit any permissions to the contents of a resource or container.

^.description: Specified that permissions should be inherited from the parent container.
